radio-player.radio-shortcut-page.form-label-note: NOTE: Radio player's lock screen and notification banner controls will not appear or work in the app preview. These functionalities do work in live applications.
radio-player.radio-shortcut-page.metadata-note: NOTE: Your RSS feed metadata must be encoded in ID3 (MP3), Icy (Shoutcast / Icecast), Vorbis Comments (Vorbis, FLAC, Opus, Speex, Theora), or QuickTime MDTA metadata (mov, qt) formats to ensure accurate display of information within the app.
radio-player.radio-shortcut-page.form-background-fiel: Only static image formats are supported (e.g. PNG, JPEG).
radio-player.radio-shortcut-page.layout-specific-prop: The following settings only apply to the static background layout
